name: Sildar Hallwinter
title: Member of griffon cavalry of Waterdeep
appearance: Kindhearted older warrior. Well-maintained chain mail. Professional soldier bearing.

goals: Find Iarno Albrek (fellow Lords' Alliance member)
Help Gundren reopen Wave Echo Cave
Bring law and order to Phandalin
personality.values: Security through action. Mutual protection. Civilization vs chaos.

background: Member of Lords' Alliance, political organization uniting free cities of the North for mutual security and prosperity. Met Gundren in Neverwinter, agreed to escort him to Phandalin.

current_situation.part1: Captured by goblins, held in Cragmaw Hideout Area 6. At 1 hp, been tortured.
current_situation.part2: After rescue, stays at Townmaster's Hall. Investigates Iarno's disappearance.

key_information: Three Rockseeker brothers found entrance to Wave Echo Cave
Wave Echo Cave = site of Phandelver's Pact mines (see Background)
Klarg had orders to waylay Gundren from 'Black Spider'
Gundren had map to Wave Echo Cave - goblins took it
Map and Gundren sent to Cragmaw Castle (doesn't know location)
Iarno Albrek came to Phandalin 2 months ago to establish order - disappeared
Iarno is human wizard, short, dark beard, 30s

find_cragmaw_castle.objective: Locate and clear Cragmaw Castle, defeat/drive off King Grol

find_iarno.objective: Investigate Tresendar Manor area, find Iarno
find_iarno.preference: Wants Iarno captured alive for trial in Neverwinter

reactions.iarno_revelation: Shocked and disappointed that fellow Alliance member turned traitor
reactions.faction_recruitment: Offers Lords' Alliance membership (title: Cloak) if party eliminates Cragmaw threat OR exposes Iarno's treachery

dialogue_examples: "My friends, let us secure lodgings. I'm told the local inn is very quaint."
"Gundren spoke highly of Wave Echo Cave. If we can secure it, Phandalin's future is bright."
"Iarno was a good man... or so I thought. I cannot believe he would betray the Alliance."
"The Cragmaws are a menace. Find their castle, and you'll find Gundren - I'm certain of it."
combat_role: If accompanying party: supportive fighter, not aggressive. Helps stabilize dying, guards prisoners, assists with strength checks. Doesn't take leadership role.
gear: Longsword, heavy crossbow, chain mail (in Cragmaw Hideout storage if rescued there)
